com.jimweller.cpuscheduler

Interface SchedulingAlgorithm

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OptionallyPreemptiveSchedulingAlgorithm
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseSchedulingAlgorithm, FCFSSchedulingAlgorithm, PrioritySchedulingAlgorithm, RandomSchedulingAlgorithm, RoundRobinSchedulingAlgorithm, SJFSchedulingAlgorithm

    public interface SchedulingAlgorithm

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addJob(Process p)
      Add the new job to the correct queue.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return a human-readable name for the algorithm.
      Process getNextJob(long currentTime)
      Returns the next process that should be run by the CPU, null if none available.
      boolean isJobFinished()
      Returns true if the current job is finished or there is no such job.
      boolean removeJob(Process p)
      Returns true if the job was present and was removed.
      void transferJobsTo(SchedulingAlgorithm otherAlg)
      Transfer all the jobs in the queue of a SchedulingAlgorithm to another, such as when switching to another algorithm in the GUI
